short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Control video playback speed and navigation on web pages.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Video Speed and Navigation Controller is a Chrome extension designed to give you unparalleled control over your video watching experience on the web. Whether you're a student speeding through lecture videos, a language learner adjusting playback for comprehension, or just someone who likes their media consumption tailored to their pace, this extension is for you.

Key Features:

* Speed Control: Adjust the playback speed of videos with simple keyboard shortcuts. Increase speed to breeze through content or slow it down to catch every detail.
* Navigation Ease: Quickly navigate through videos with handy shortcuts. Skip forward or backward in set intervals to efficiently find the sections you need.
* Seamless Integration: Works effortlessly across various websites, providing a consistent and reliable experience no matter where you watch.
* User-friendly Overlay: A minimalist overlay shows your current playback speed, ensuring you're always aware of your settings without intrusive UI elements.
* Effortless Reset: Reset playback speed to normal with a single key press - perfect for returning to standard viewing after speed adjustments.
* Optimized Performance: Designed with efficiency in mind, our extension ensures minimal CPU and memory usage, keeping your browser fast and responsive.
* Responsive Design: Whether you resize your window or go full screen, the overlay adjusts its position dynamically, keeping the user interface intuitive and accessible.

Customizable Keyboard Shortcuts:

* Increase Speed (D/d): Nudge up the speed in increments for precision control.
* Decrease Speed (S/s): Ease down the speed in small steps for perfect pacing.
* Jump Forward (X/x): Skip ahead in the video to bypass content or reach your point of interest.
* Jump Backward (Z/z): Go back to revisit or catch details you might have missed.
* Reset Speed (A/a): Instantly return to the standard playback rate for regular viewing.
* Show Speed (Q/q): Show current speed.

Compatibility and Performance:

We've worked hard to make this extension light on resources and compatible with a wide range of video platforms, including some of the most popular sites like YouTube and Vimeo.

Install Now and Transform Your Video Watching Experience!
